java/liquibase/parser/filter/CountChangeSetFilter.java

00001 package liquibase.parser.filter;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 
00005 public class CountChangeSetFilter implements ChangeSetFilter {
00006 
00007     private int changeSetsToAllow;
00008     private int changeSetsSeen = 0;
00009 
00010     public CountChangeSetFilter(int changeSetsToAllow) {
00011         this.changeSetsToAllow = changeSetsToAllow;
00012     }
00013 
00014     public boolean accepts(ChangeSet changeSet) {
00015         changeSetsSeen++;
00016         return changeSetsSeen <= changeSetsToAllow;
00017     }
00018 }
